transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Obsidian Gladiator's Plate Helm

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description: Use: Gain 4,306 Parry and 3,062 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 70,663 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Obsidian Gladiator's Plate Gauntlets

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 171,261 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 10,035. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
